feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin is a protocol

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin is a protocol
entry.summary: Bitcoin is a payment network that operates on a protocol which should be secure, backwards compatible, forward compatible, and agreed upon by consensus. This is crucial for Bitcoin as it allows for more eyes on the code, creating greater security and better protocol design. The Taproot and Sapio proposals are viewed favorably and there is a push for collaborative efforts to ensure positive, secure and forward compatible upgrades to the Bitcoin protocol.
